You are an AI model for assigning customer support inquiries from X (formerly Twitter) to the correct company. Analyze the input, which is a batch of conversations provided as a list of lists. Each inner list contains messages in chronological order. Identify the company associated with each conversation.

Output one of the following companies: {'TfL', 'hulu_support', 'SW_Help', 'askpanera', 'AirbnbHelp', 'TMobileHelp', 'sainsburys', 'DoorDash_Help', 'USCellularCares', 'ChipotleTweets', 'GloCare', 'AppleSupport', 'PandoraSupport', 'ATT', 'UPSHelp', 'TacoBellTeam', 'GooglePlayMusic', 'Ask_Spectrum', 'GreggsOfficial', 'DellCares', 'BofA_Help', 'KFC_UKI_Help', 'marksandspencer', 'DropboxSupport', 'HiltonHelp', 'AskTarget', 'Postmates_Help', 'AldiUK', 'nationalrailenq', 'Walmart', 'comcastcares', 'airtel_care', 'sprintcare', 'VirginAtlantic', 'Kimpton', 'IHGService', 'NortonSupport', 'HPSupport', 'AskCiti', 'ArbysCares', 'NeweggService', 'Uber_Support', 'asksalesforce', 'SouthwestAir', 'AskRBC', 'MOO', 'YahooCare', 'MicrosoftHelps', 'Tesco', 'Delta', 'AskTigogh', 'LondonMidland', 'sizehelpteam', 'TwitterSupport', 'Safaricom_Care', 'VMUcare', 'VerizonSupport', 'CenturyLinkHelp', 'Unknown', 'AskPlayStation', 'British_Airways', 'NikeSupport', 'DunkinDonuts', 'McDonalds', 'mediatemplehelp', 'AskRobinhood', 'AlaskaAir', 'AzureSupport', 'VirginTrains', 'AskSeagate', 'Ask_WellsFargo', 'O2', 'SpotifyCares', 'JetBlue', 'idea_cares', 'XboxSupport', 'AmazonHelp', 'ChaseSupport', 'GWRHelp', 'AskDSC', 'AskVirginMoney', 'BoostCare', 'OfficeSupport', 'AmericanAir', 'AskeBay', 'ArgosHelpers', 'AskAmex', 'ATVIAssist', 'AsurionCares', 'JackBox', 'MTNC_Care', 'SCsupport', 'AskLyft', 'AskPayPal', 'CoxHelp', 'AskPapaJohns', 'AirAsiaSupport', 'AdobeCare', 'AWSSupport', 'Morrisons', 'VirginAmerica', 'GoDaddyHelp'}. [['just a reminder that  are a vile company, stole £800 from me a month ago & still havent refunded me despite saying they would', 'Hi Person if you would like to DM some details through to us, we can try and get an update for you ^BM', 'thanks Person sent a message around 30 mins ago', 'Thanks Person I have replied to you there ^BM'], ['Wow  preboards passengers wearing  gear. #perks', "We're happy to welcome you on board! -Maeghan", 'At all airports? Or just PDX?', 'Pre boarding for wearing a Timbers jersey is just when traveling out of Portland  -Sara'], ['I just had the WORST customer experience with  receptionist. I will never buy a damn thing from them again.', "2/2 to serve you better & Direct message the issue details, service tag or order number & owner's name to assist you further. ^PL"], ["I bought a PC case yesterday for $69.99 and today it's $5 off. Can you refund me the difference?", 'Hello \xa0I would be happy to assist you. Can you please DM me your order number?-N'], ['I cant Connect my Interactive Broker ( Canada) with yahoo finance App in ios 11, Any suggestions.. ??', 'Hi - are you receiving an error message when trying to link the account?'], ["I'm new to nike+ run club app,  should i start with guided runs or my couch?", "While the Coach plans can be weeks in time. It's up to you to decide what fits you best. (2/2)", 'Thank you nike', "You're welcome, Person Give us a shout if you need assistance with anything else. Good luck with the NRC app."], ['As expected. None of you big companies seem to care about spending some $ on infrastructure in smaller areas. Thx for 2 minutes to say SOL.'], ['spoiling myself with this beauty of a Halloween treat!  A zesty Italian white that is truly spooktacular. #aldiwineclub https://t.co/Fo3UwrztLm', 'Glad you enjoyed it, Person 🎃🍷'], ['svp il y a pas le renouvellement automatique de forfait Internet chez vous ?? Retenir les heures me dépasse après ça foire', "Y'ello Person 

Nous vous remercions pour votre suggestion 
Elle a été prise en compte"], ['Woah... I have more than enough Airmiles to go to the moon with  ✈️🌝', "So what you're saying is, we're taking a trip soon?", 'I think we could do a live show from there?'], ['So , why am I paying 10 dollars a month plus the fee to get my screen fixed only for you to tell me I can only get my phone fixed twice within the year ?', "Our policy states that only 2 claims can be filed in a 12 month period. Have you already filed 2 claims? Who's the carrier? ^AW", 'Noted. I am asking why is that the policy if I’m paying 10 dollars a month plus the fee ? ... ATT', 'We welcome you to review the terms and conditions on https://t.co/yrI0fNtdTj. ^AW', 'I’m okay. Thank you for your service.', 'Let us know if we can be of any further assistance. ^AW'], ['Trick-or-treater dressed as  guy just left a package at neighbor’s house! Had the truck and everything! Really committed to the role!', 'UPDATE: That trick-or-treater was an actual  guy. I got tricked so hard!', "LOL!! Sneaky guys aren't they! ^CH"], ['12  Christmas sarnies and only 2 are vegetarian. Think Person Person would be disappointed. Suggest seek advice from ? 🥦', "Thanks for your feedback, Person and we'll share it with our Food team for future consideration."], ['. #InDesign 2018 is unbelievably buggy. Please fix asap. #adobe', "Would you mind providing more details about the issue? We'd certainly follow up. ^Raj https://t.co/iuwZCjz4Or", "I have OS HighSierra installed the bug fix & now it's crashing, losing work, can't undo & recovered documents have none of my updates.", 'Please check if this helps: https://t.co/UpomsQUl23 & let us know how it goes. ^Raj', "Hi Person none of these have helped me. PS & Illustr are starting to have issues also, shutting down & losing work etc. I'll log the problems"], ['Hong Kong has taken over 10 weeks to process a supplementary card for my domestic partner. LGBT /gay discrimination?', "We haven't received the requested information and will consider this request resolved. Send a DM if help is needed. TY! ^JT"], ["I'm now trapped in a long queue at new St because there was no way to collect my prepaid ticket at lob:-( why can't there be machines here or more staff or even staff at lob?", "< I would have thought the ticket machine was working as there are no reports it's not.", 'https://t.co/ZBbbQrDooA', 'Really sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. I will send your tweets over to the station manager.'], ['Holy smokes, ! I just had the best #KimptonKarma customer support experience. What a gem! ❤️❤️❤️', "Wow, Person we can tell it must've been something else because of your excitement. This makes us so happy to hear!"], ['Please tell me why my  has expired, but I’m still being charged????', 'Hi there, please DM us you Adobe id so that we may have a quick look at your account details.   ^Tanuj https://t.co/iuwZCjz4Or'], ['re Burnham: do you have to put the ashtray right at station entrance? Every morn & night I get covered in smoke having to walk thru', 'Hi Person Sorry to hear this. I will report this to the station manager right away. Person'], ['#VTUPDATE Some lines will be reopened shortly https://t.co/2KqKJLRjei', 'Are the passengers still stuck', 'Services are still meeting with delays at Preston while the station is closed. ^SB'], ['LIVE RIGHT NOW: One of the co-founder of  speaks at #HarlemTechWeek. #HTW #BlackTwitter  #Blerds   https://t.co/QiU0pm4tYB', 'Nice! Let us know how you enjoy it!'], ['I wish someone cared enough for me to make me a cute ass playlist on Spotify ❤️', "Hi there! Do you have a specific genre in mind? Which artists are you in to right now? We'll see what we can whip up for you /LP"], ['. this definitely isn’t my hair 🤢 https://t.co/NmVZq0dRF7', 'We take food quality very seriously. Please send us a DM with your cafe info so we can follow up with our team.'], ["normally i wouldn't care, , but on world series night this is suboptimal https://t.co/Midghp1i8z", 'Oh no! Please reach out to an inflight crewmember for options.'], ['glad we paying $100/ month for internet that doesnt work. Thanks!!', 'Hello, let me do some research on the account to see what is causing this problem. Please DM for assistance, thank you. -DP', 'Everyday right around 8pm the internet only works in fits and starts'], ['However, I even noticed a couple of the instructions in here are not compatible with the current state of https://t.co/8sFGpZAJ4c.', "It's like the documentation has been updated before the preconfigured solution has."], ['It says vol 1 and vol 2 will there be more?'], ['Being naughty and ordering Mac and cheese though  🤗🤗🤗', 'At least I’m being productive and grading while waiting for my food to get here.', "please send us a direct message at  with your email address, and we'll check on your order status."], ['Thanks for applying it on my Last booking november 11th now', "Hi again, we're glad everything worked out. Let us know if you have any questions or concerns as we're just a DM away.", 'Please apply it now on my last booking', 'Hi Person we are unable to apply a coupon to an already accepted reservation. We are sorry for any inconvenience that this may cause.'], ['Fuck  and the monopoly major airlines have over smaller airlines. https://t.co/qQnpsRV4OB', 'We have several purchase options. Please check here: https://t.co/O6Fdx4Pk6T and let us know if you have any questions.'], ['When someone walks on the bus with  😋 https://t.co/r49iXFt7GN', 'Glad we can make your day, Person', 'can you make my day?'], ['I’m trying to book a round trip flight from AUS to RDU', "Thanks Person The error is due to the route you're trying to book. Give us a call at 1-800-JETBLUE so we can look at options with you.", 'Thanks for the help.  web site worked so I booked through them. Will try y’all next time I fly.', '👌']]
